member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.BandState
member.summary: Enumerates the possible states of a Band object.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.BandState.Collapsed
member.summary: The band is in collapsed mode. This means that only its caption is visible.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.BandState.Expanded
member.summary: The band is in expanded mode.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border
member.summary: Defines the possible styles of a border.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.None
member.summary: No border.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.Flat
member.summary: Flat or single line border.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.Raised
member.summary: The border has raised appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.Sunken
member.summary: The border has sunken appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.Etched
member.summary: The border has etched appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Border.ModalFrame
member.summary: The border has modal frame appearance.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandType
member.summary: Defines the possible types of commands

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandType.Method
member.summary: Method commands are excetuded with no additional data. Can be executed with a single toolbar button click

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandType.Check
member.summary: Applies to commands, which have a checked/unchecked state.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandType.Radio
member.summary: Applies to mutually exclusive commands.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandType.Choice
member.summary: Applies on commands which need addtional data in order to be executed.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ControlAppearance
member.summary: Determines the appearance of a control

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ControlAppearance.Default
member.summary: Appearance is synchronized with the OS settings

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ControlAppearance.Flat
member.summary: Custom Flat style appearance

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Defines the format of the date time column style.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat.CustomDateTime
member.summary: Date time format is defined by the user

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat.Date
member.summary: Short date (based on default locale date time format)

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat.LongDate
member.summary: Long date (based on default locale date time format)

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat.Time
member.summary: Time is formatted based on default locale date time format

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeFormat.DateTime
member.summary: The date time is formatted with the default locale date time format

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.TabAlign
member.summary: Specifies the layout strategy of a TabControl object.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.TabAlign.Top
member.summary: The tabstrip is top aligned.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.TabAlign.Bottom
member.summary: The tabstrip is bottom aligned.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.TabAlign.Left
member.summary: The tabstrip is left aligned.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.TabAlign.Right
member.summary: The tabstrip is right aligned.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle
member.summary: Available styles for a ToolBarButton object.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown
member.summary: The button will display a drop-down menu.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle.Push
member.summary: A simple push-like button. This is the default style.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle.Toggle
member.summary: The button will serve as a checkbox and will have two states - checked and uncheked.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator
member.summary: A separator (spacing) between two buttons.

member.name: F:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButtonStyle.Control
member.summary: The button will serve as a placeholder for a Control.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Band
member.summary: Represents a band in a PanelBar object. The band is actually a panel, which can be collapsed or expanded. When the band is collapsed only its caption is visible.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.BandCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of Band objects.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ComboBox
member.summary: This class represents standard Windows.Forms.ComboBox control with custom painting and support for object.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Command
member.summary: Represents a command in an application. Commands can be executed through menus, toolbar buttons and programmatically.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.CommandBar
member.summary: This class represents the top-level manager for ToolBar objects.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridComboBoxColumnStyle
member.summary: Combo box column style

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridControlColumnStyleBase
member.summary: Base class for all columns styles which require editing control

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridDateTimeColumnStyle
member.summary: Column style, which can be used for the visual editing of date time values represented by Ole Automation dates (double values)

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.DataGridTextControlColumnStyleBase
member.summary: Base control for column styles, which need a control for visual editing of values which can be represented as simple text

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.MeasurementNumericUpDown
member.summary: This class overrides the default implementation of the NumericUpDown class in order to add the current measurement units to the formatted text.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.NumericUpDown
member.summary: Represents a class that provides custom painting of the standard NumericUpDown control.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.OwnerDrawMenuItem
member.summary: Represents a class that inherits from the System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem class and provides custom drawing, which is dependent on the current OS appearance settings.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.PanelBar
member.summary: Represents a panel bar, which contains one or more Band objects.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.Shortcut
member.summary: Represents a keyboard shortcut combination, which can be assigned to a Command object.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.StatusBar
member.summary: Represents a standard Windows.Forms.StatusBar with custom look and predefined panels.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBar
member.summary: Represents a toolbar-like control with flat appearance and support for custom drop-down controls. It provides all the functionality of the standard Windows.Forms.ToolBar as well as moving and changing location. This toolbar also provides some extended features as dropping custom objects instead of the standard ContextMenus.

member.name: T:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton
member.summary: Represents a button on a object. May have one of the five predefined styles. See for more information.

member.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

member.name: M:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.ToString
member.summary: Overriden. The human readable representation of the button.
member.returns: If assigned a Command object returns command's description, otherwise returns the of the button.

member.name: M:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.UpdateFromCommand
member.summary: Depending on the object assigned, the toolbar button sets its Style and depending on this style gets additional data such as ContextMenu or Control

member.name: M:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overriden. Releases all the resources used by the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the object for the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.ContextMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets the the button will display. Only works if Style is set to ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Control
member.summary: Gest or sets the control this button will display. Only works with Style set to ToolBarButtonStyle.Control.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the button is currently enabled.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the image index for the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Parent
member.summary: Gets the object that owns the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Pushed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the state of the button is pushed. Only works with Style set to ToolBarButtonStyle.Toggle.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Rectangle
member.summary: Gets the bounds of the button relative to its parent toolbar.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the field of the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional data associated with the button.

member.name: P:Xceed.Chart.UIControls.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText
member.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip this button will display.
